description: [IcedID](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0483) has been executed through Word and Excel files with malicious embedded macros and through ISO and LNK files that execute the malicious DLL.(Citation: Juniper IcedID June 2020)(Citation: DFIR_Quantum_Ransomware)(Citation: DFIR_Sodinokibi_Ransomware)

external_references.description: DFIR. (2021, March 29). Sodinokibi (aka REvil) Ransomware. Retrieved July 22, 2024.
DFIR. (2022, April 25). Quantum Ransomware. Retrieved July 26, 2024.
Kimayong, P. (2020, June 18). COVID-19 and FMLA Campaigns used to install new IcedID banking malware. Retrieved July 14, 2020.
